articles.title: Cognizant reports 2.3% year-on-year decline in revenue in December quarter - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: This decline comes at a time when its Indian peers TCS, Infosys, Wipro and HCL Tech have posted strong growth on the back of improving demand environment, deals wins.
articles.content:
Teaneck-based IT services provider Cognizant posted a revenue decline of 2.3 percent to $4.2 billion year-on-year for the quarter ending December 2020.

articles.title: Airtel takes on growth leadership mantle, as Reliance Jio slows down - Mint
articles.description: On a year-on-year basis, Airtel’s India mobile revenues have grown by 32.4% and its Ebitda has jumped 61%. This, of course, comes on the back of the tariff hikes taken last December, and an improvement in subscriber mix.
articles.content: For the second quarter in succession, Bharti Airtel Ltd has beaten Reliance Jio Infocomm Ltds net subscriber additions figure by a wide margin. Airtel added 14.2 million subscribers in the December q… [+3262 chars]
